faqs.question: What is Black Belt Prep?
faqs.answer:
Black Belt Prep is a comprehensive question bank designed to help you prepare for your PANCE exam. It contains practice questions, detailed explanations, custom quizzes, weekly personalized study plans, and much more.
The question bank is available for a one-time payment of $399 for one-year access, or $59 for monthly subscription. You can purchase it by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/course/view.php?id=9.

faqs.question: How do I access the question bank?
faqs.answer: You can access the question bank by logging into your account. Click here to login or register: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/login/index.php

faqs.question: How to register?
faqs.answer: You can register by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/login/signup.php

faqs.question: How to login?
faqs.answer: You can login by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/login/index.php

faqs.question: Are the questions updated regularly?
faqs.answer: Yes, our question bank is regularly updated to reflect the latest exam patterns and content. Click here to go to the question bank: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/course/view.php?id=9

faqs.question: Can I track my progress?
faqs.answer: Yes, the platform provides detailed analytics and progress tracking. You can view your performance metrics, identify weak areas, and track your improvement over time. Here is the link to your Dashboard: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/my/

faqs.question: What topics are covered in the question bank?
faqs.answer: The question bank covers all major topics required for the PANCE exam, including core concepts, advanced techniques, and practical applications. Each topic includes multiple practice questions, detailed explanations and visualizations.

faqs.question: How can I get help if I have questions?
faqs.answer: I can help you with most common questions. If you have any other questions, please contact our support team through Contact page: https://blackbeltprep.com/contact.html

faqs.question: How much does the PANCE course cost on Black Belt Prep?
faqs.answer: The PANCE course is available for a one-time payment of $399 for one-year access, or $59 for monthly subscription. You can purchase it by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/course/view.php?id=9.

faqs.question: How much does it cost?

faqs.question: How to refund?
faqs.answer: Refund requests must be made within 5 calendar days of purchase. Refund requests beyond this period will not be honored. Send an email to info@blackbelttestprep.com to request a refund.

faqs.question: How many questions are there in the question bank?
faqs.answer: There are 1000+ questions in the question bank. You can view the question bank by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/course/view.php?id=9

faqs.question: Total questions?
faqs.answer: There are 1000+ questions in the question bank. You can view the question bank by clicking on this link: https://blackbeltprep.com/moodle/course/view.php?id=9

faqs.question: What is thePANCE Pass Guarantee?
faqs.answer:
Black Belt Test Prep provides a Pass Guarantee for the PANCE exam under the following conditions:
- You must complete at least 90% of the materials provided.
- You must provide proof of failure of the PANCE exam taken after your purchase date.
- Guarantee claims must be submitted via email to our support team (info@blackbeltprep.com) within 90 calendar days from the last valid subscription date.
If eligible, your subscription will be extended at no additional charge, equivalent to the duration/valuei nitially purchased.

faqs.question: What services are provided?
faqs.answer: Subscribers will receive access to Black Belt Test Prep's question bank, including questions and multiple-choice answer selections designed for PANCE exam preparation. Additionally, subscribers may receive test-taking tips and AI-driven analysis; however, such supplementary materials are provided at the sole discretion of Black Belt Test Prep. AI technology is evolving and may sometimes produce unintended outputs. Black Belt Test Prep cannot always fully control these outputs. Users are encouraged to notify Black Belt Test Prep promptly if any unintended or problematic outputs are observed.

faqs.question: What is the business identification of Black Belt Test Prep?
faqs.answer: Black Belt Test Prep is a Doing Business As (DBA) entity of Two Doves Harvest, LLC, a Florida-based corporation. Payments and invoices will reflect the name Two Doves Harvest, LLC.

faqs.question: Termination of Subscription?
faqs.answer: Black Belt Test Prep reserves the right to immediately terminate any subscription, without refund, if the customer violates any terms outlined in this agreement.
